title: Driving Home For Christmas
lyrics:
I'm driving home for Christmas
I can't wait to see those faces
Yeah, I'm driving home for Christmas, yeah, yeah
Well, I'm moving down that line

And it's been so long
But I'll be there, I'll sing this song
To pass the time away
I'm drivin' in my car

Driving home for Christmas
I'm driving home for Christmas

Top-to-toe in tailbacks
I got red lights all around
But soon there'll be a freeway, yeah
Get my feet on holy ground

So I sing for you
Though you can't hear me when I get through
And feel you near me
I'm driving in my car

I'm driving home for Christmas
Driving home for Christmas
I'm driving home for Christmas
Driving home for Christmas

So I sing for you
Though you can't hear me when I get through
Oh, and feel you near me
I'm driving in my car

I'm driving home for Christmas
I'm driving home for Christmas
I'm driving home for Christmas
I'm driving homе for Christmas

I'm driving home
